overview: Adria Rae directs and stars in her first project for Deeper in this collection of five indulgent vignettes. Complete with fantasies of sexual transaction and domination, cuckolding and threesome experiments, manipulative anal and dreamy hallucinations that blur the lines between real and unreal, each story builds a tension that bursts into a perfeectly crafted explosion of sexual energy.
title: If It Feels Good
